orientation.title: Module Orientation
orientation.description: left: large tile on Left; right: large tile on right

mobileDisplay.title: Mobile Display Option
mobileDisplay.description: select between vertically stacked, 1 large followed by a 2x2 grid, or all carousel
examples: 1x4 = 1 large tile followed by a 2x2 grid of smaller tiles
carousel = all tiles create a carousel

textAlignment.title: Text Alignment
textAlignment.description: left, right, or center text alignment (Overrides individual card settings)

verticalAlignment.title: Vertical Text Alignment
verticalAlignment.description: top, middle, or bottom text alignment (Overrides individual card settings)

linkPosition.title: Position Link with card text
linkPosition.description: place link with the card text OR below the image. Text Alignment still applies. (Overrides individual card settings)

cards.title: Cards
cards.description: Please select the Cards to display
